DOC.brief_summary: Comparison NEOVIST 370 INJ . ( Iopromide 768.86mg ) Ultravist 370 INJ . ( Iopromide 768.86mg ) abdominal CT
DOC.brief_title: Comparison NEOVIST 370 INJ . ( Iopromide 768.86mg ) With Ultravist 370 INJ . ( Iopromide 768.86mg ) Abdominal CT
DOC.criteria: Aged 20 75 year old . Subjects need CT scan Subjects willing participate study write inform consent form . Subjects severe hepatopathy whose AST ALT ≥ 1,000 IU/L , Subjects liver cirrhosis whose AST ALT ≥ UNL ( upper normal limit ) X 3 Severe disorder thyroid gland homocystinuria pregnant breastfeed female subject , female subject childbearing potential willing use proper contraception method Participation another clinical trial within 30days enrollment study .
DOC.keyword: Qualitative Evaluation abdominal CT image use 4 point scale : Excellent ( 4 ) / Good ( 3 ) / Fair ( 2 ) / Unacceptable ( 1 )
